tool_description: Access to all metal-archives bands via a simple API
name: Metal Archives API
title: Metal Archives API

api_list.name: getBandDiscography
api_list.description: Retrieves a band's discography by id and type

api_list.name: getBandProfile
api_list.description: Retrieves a band's profile by its id

api_list.name: findBand
api_list.description: Search a band by its name

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page of results to retrieve
